function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Supply chain disruption due to shipping delays, gaps in preparedness, and logistical bottlenecks.","Impact":"Shortages of essential goods and equipment, delay in distribution.","Mitigation":"Diversify suppliers, improve preparedness and contingency plans.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time monitoring systems.","People":"Supply chain executives, critical infrastructure operators.","Owner":"Supply chain executives, critical infrastructure operators."},{"Description":"Fluctuations in demand leading to fast reductions or spikes in demand for products.","Impact":"Overstocking or shortages of products, financial pressure.","Mitigation":"Demand forecasting, agile production systems.","Technologies":"Demand forecasting software, inventory management systems.","People":"Supply chain executives, production managers.","Owner":"Supply chain executives, production managers."},{"Description":"Dependence on global suppliers leading to shortages of essential goods and equipment.","Impact":"Shortages of medical equipment and PPE, impact on healthcare system.","Mitigation":"Diversify suppliers, increase local production.","Technologies":"Supplier management tools, automated manufacturing systems.","People":"Healthcare system operators, critical infrastructure operators.","Owner":"Healthcare system operators, critical infrastructure operators."}]}
